title: Final Touch Pool Shots, Set of 6 with Rack Tray (FTA1836)
features: Removable shot glass for easy cleaning.

Includes: 6 multi-colored pool shots with triangle rack serving tray | Dimensions: Tray: 6.2" L x 6.8" W x 1.9" H (15.8cm L x 17.3cm W x 4.8cm H) | Capacity: 1 ounce (30 milliliter) | Material: Glass & Plastic (BPA-free) | Washing: Hand wash
description: Put a new spin on billiards night with your buddies with these pool ball shot glasses. Each different coloured pool ball can be removed from the glass shot base for easy cleaning. The included rack tray makes serving a cinch and provides convenient storage when not in use.
